mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.empolyee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectMemberNo() */ LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_MEMBER_NO'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.empolyee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectDeptList() */ A.DEPT_CODE , A.DEPT_NAME , A.DEPT_CALL_NUMBER FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT A
SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.employee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectJobList() */ A.JOB_CODE , A.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_JOB A
SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.employee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectRoleList() */ A.ROLE_CODE , A.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_ROLE A GROUP BY A.ROLE_CODE, A.ROLE_NAME
SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.employee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectMemberId() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.employee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectMngEmployeeList() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , B.DEPT_NAME , C.JOB_NAME , A.EMAIL , B.DEPT_CALL_NUMBER , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ENT_YN , D.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB C ON (A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE D ON (A.ROLE_CODE = D.ROLE_CODE) ORDER BY A.MEMBER_NO

SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.employee.model.dao.MngEmployeeDAO#selectOneMngEmployee() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , B.DEPT_NAME , A.JOB_CODE , C.JOB_NAME , A.EMAIL , B.DEPT_CALL_NUMBER , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ENT_YN , A.ROLE_CODE , D.ROLE_NAME , A.GENDER , A.BIRTHDAY , A.RRN , A.PHONE , A.ADDRESS , A.QUESTION_CODE , E.QUESTION_BODY , A.QUESTION_ANSWER FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB C ON (A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE D ON (A.ROLE_CODE = D.ROLE_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_CHECK_QUESTION E ON (A.QUESTION_CODE = E.QUESTION_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
